name: Redead (jtgdev)
description:
Redead is a game where dying is key. Use your own corpses to solve puzzles in order to break the curse and escape the never ending loop.

It’s a puzzle-platformer where the player swaps with their own corpses on a very limited timer to maneuver difficult levels and solve puzzles.
Today we have the tutorial sequence (and a little bit more) to show you and make you test. Must be played with a keyboard and a mouse.

CONTROLS:

A + D : Horizontal movement.
W : Jump.
X: Die at will and respawn.
Left click on a corpse: Swapping bodies ability.
Esc. : Open menu.
